title: User Registration with Valid Email and Password
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with a valid email address and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page
Enter a valid email address and strong password
Click the 'Sign Up' button
Confirm that registration is successful and user is redirected to dashboard

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Validate that a registered user can log in with correct email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page
Input registered email and correct password
Click the 'Login' button
User is authenticated and redirected to the user dashboard

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify that login is denied when entering an incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page
Input registered email with incorrect password
Click the 'Login' button
Login is rejected with an error message displayed

title: Access Dashboard Without Authentication
description: Ensure users cannot access the dashboard or protected routes without authentication.

steps.description: Navigate directly to the dashboard URL without logging in
User is redirected to the sign-in page

title: Browse Tours by Category
description: Verify that users can browse tours grouped by categories and that the correct products display under each category.

steps.description: Navigate to the category browsing page
Select a tour category
Display is updated showing tours belonging only to the selected category with correct details

title: View Detailed Product Page with Dynamic Pricing and Images
description: Ensure product detail pages correctly display dynamic pricing, image galleries, tours description, and location maps.

steps.description: Navigate to a product listing from category or search
Click on a product to open the detailed product page
Verify product description, pricing options, image gallery, and embedded location map are clearly visible and accurate

title: Search Products by Name and Keywords
description: Check that the global search bar returns relevant products based on entered names or keywords.

steps.description: Enter a valid tour name or keyword into the global search bar
Submit the search query
Search results page shows a list of products matching the search criteria

title: Add Item to Cart and Verify Cart Updates
description: Verify adding an item to cart reflects correctly in the cart view and item count.

steps.description: From the product detail page, click 'Add to Cart'
Item appears in the cart with correct quantity and pricing

title: Update Item Quantity in Cart
description: Check that user can update the quantity of an item in the cart and pricing updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the cart page
Increase or decrease the quantity of a chosen cart item
Cart updates the quantity and recalculates total price correctly

title: Remove Item from Cart
description: Confirm that removing an item from the cart updates the cart and total price correctly.

steps.description: Open the cart page or cart sheet
Remove an item from the cart
Item is removed and cart totals are updated accurately

title: Wishlist Functionality Add and Remove
description: Verify users can add items to the wishlist and remove them, ensuring persistence during session.

steps.description: From a product page, click the 'Add to Wishlist' button
Product is added to the wishlist
Remove the product from the wishlist
Product is removed from the wishlist

title: Successful Checkout Process Handling
description: Validate that after completing checkout, payment success page is shown and order is recorded in booking history.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with items in cart
Complete the mocked payment successfully
Payment success page is shown and booking appears in user dashboard order history

title: Checkout Payment Cancellation Handling
description: Ensure that payment cancellation leads to appropriate notification and user can continue browsing.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout and cancel the payment
Payment cancellation page is displayed and cart remains unchanged
Navigate away and verify cart still contains items

title: User Dashboard Displays Booking History
description: Check that the authenticated user's dashboard accurately lists all past bookings with correct details.

steps.description: Log in as an authenticated user with past bookings
Navigate to user dashboard
Booking history is shown accurately with correct bookings and details

title: Profile Management Updates Persist
description: Verify that updates made to user profile details are saved and reflected correctly in the dashboard.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to profile management section
Change profile details such as name, contact info
Save changes
Changes persist and are displayed correctly after page refresh

title: Static Content Pages Accessibility and Accuracy
description: Confirm that all static informational pages (About Us, Contact Us, Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, Refund, Cancellation) are accessible and render accurate content.

steps.description: Navigate to each static content page via menu or URL
Page loads without errors and company & policy information is up-to-date and displayed clearly

title: Responsive UI Layout on Multiple Device Sizes
description: Validate UI adapts correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop with no visual or functional regressions.

steps.description: Access the application on various device viewports or simulators (mobile, tablet, desktop)
All UI components render correctly with proper layout, font sizes, and no overlaps or truncations

title: Performance Metrics: Fast Load and Smooth Interactions
description: Assess critical performance metrics such as Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) and Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) meet acceptable thresholds in popular browsers.

steps.description: Load key pages such as home, product detail, and dashboard using Chrome DevTools or Lighthouse
LCP is below 2.5 seconds and CLS is minimal to none, ensuring smooth user experience

title: Consistent Data State Across Client and Server
description: Verify that data fetched and updated by React Query and Context API remains consistent and synchronized between server and UI on various operations.

steps.description: Perform data mutations such as adding/removing cart items or updating profile
UI reflects changes instantly and data remains consistent on page reload or navigation

title: Error Message Display on Network Failure
description: Check that appropriate user-friendly error messages display when server or network errors occur during authentication, browsing, or checkout.

steps.description: Simulate network failure or server error during login, product browsing, or payment
Relevant error message is shown guiding the user clearly
